I can’t verify this and I don’t even recall where I read it, but the claim has made that the Einstein was working on his “theory of everything”, writing in his notebook, on the day he died. Genius has its limits, though—Einstein’s conception of quantum mechanics and thus one pillar on which he would have to base a theory was no longer generally accepted and is now contradicted by a substantial amount of experimental evidence. It’s pretty hard to produce a successful theory when you start off disagreeing with reality.
